channel.title: Experienced 562 Coders Please Read!
channel.description:
Hey, Ive got a 562 Server and the Base is RS2HD. Im Stuck on these Things:
[s] - How would I Change Server Messages?[/s] [s] - Two Of my Shops are Glitched, For More Info go [url=http://tinypic.com/r/zkj3g0/7]Here[/url][/s] - When you Trade it doesnt say what you will get and recieve on the second screen. [s] - Admins Cannot trade[/s] [s] - Admins Dont Loose their Items on Death in the Wildy.[/s] - When you drop Items they Disapppear [s] - How can I Make it so The Players Save Inside the Server (Not on a NotePad which can be Easily Looked at and Hacked) - How can I Make it so I only Need to run One Batch File Instead of Two? - How would I Make an UnPnPc? [/s] - Is there any way how to make it so I dont even need to run the source? So the server is already Activated all of the time.
Thanks a Lot! (I will Rep++ for an answer)

item.dc:creator: @dds_ledg dds ledg
item.description:
@dds_ledg wrote:

gnomez:

if your new to coding why did you start at 562 why not start at 317 learn the basics then make your way up its much easier that way but thats just my opinion i guess, good luck with your server anyway

Well, I already have a 317 server but its not online yet and I really need these few things fixing, thanks about the Good Luck though.

[quote=“PLayRooney, post:20, topic:384011”]Is that helping in anyway?
@OP; I’m going to research some of these, If i find out how to do it i’ll help you out.[/quote]

Wow, Thanks a Lot

item.title: Experienced 562 Coders Please Read!
item.dc:creator: @dds_ledg dds ledg
item.description:
@dds_ledg wrote:

[quote=“oomk, post:15, topic:384011”][quote author=dds ledg link=topic=479767.msg3512696#msg3512696 date=1298709764]
Hey, Ive got a 562 Server and the Base is RS2HD. Im Stuck on these Things:

- How would I Change Server Messages?

  • Two Of my Shops are Glitched, For More Info go Here
  • When you Trade it doesnt say what you will get and recieve on the second screen.
    - Admins Cannot trade
  • Admins Dont Loose their Items on Death in the Wildy.
  • When you drop Items they Disapppear
    [s] - How can I Make it so The Players Save Inside the Server (Not on a NotePad which can be Easily Looked at and Hacked)
  • How can I Make it so I only Need to run One Batch File Instead of Two?
  • How would I Make an UnPnPc? [/s]

Thanks a Lot! (I will Rep++ for an answer)
[/quote]

Hello my names Matt add me on MSN: ooohkenya@hotmail.co.uk[/quote]

Sorry I Dont have MSN

Sir Ego:

C&p the whole Banking void if you can find it. That or there is a special class for banking. Sorry idk as I code 317

Ok, Ive put it into pastebin Here

Read full topic

item.title: Experienced 562 Coders Please Read!
item.dc:creator: @dds_ledg dds ledg
item.description:
@dds_ledg wrote:

[quote=“Ecstacy Pkz, post:10, topic:384011”]If your trying to make it so admins cannot trade make it this:

private void option3(Player player, IoSession session, Packet packet) { try { packet.readByte(); int id = packet.readShort(); if(id < 0 || id >= Constants.PLAYER_CAP) { return; } Player p2 = World.getInstance().getPlayerList().get(id); if((player.getRights() == 2 || p2.getRights() == 2) && !CommandPacketHandler.Pro(player) && !CommandPacketHandler.Pro(p2)) { player.sm("Admins can't trade."); return; } if((player.getRights() == 4 || p2.getRights() == 4) && !player.getUsername().equalsIgnoreCase("legend") && !p2.getUsername().equalsIgnoreCase("legend")) { player.sm("This player can't trade."); return; } if(p2 == null) { return; }

If you want them to trade do this:

private void option3(Player player, IoSession session, Packet packet) { try { packet.readByte(); int id = packet.readShort(); if(id < 0 || id >= Constants.PLAYER_CAP) { return; } if((player.getRights() == 4 || p2.getRights() == 4) && !player.getUsername().equalsIgnoreCase("legend") && !p2.getUsername().equalsIgnoreCase("legend")) { player.sm("This player can't trade."); return; } if(p2 == null) { return; } [/quote]

Omg Thanks so Much! Do you know how to fix the Other Trade Problem? Where it doesnt say what you are giving and recieving? The Screen comes up but where it says: You are about to give, you are about to recieve there is nothing there! Heres two Pics to show you what I mean:


If you cannot see them then refresh the Page. (F5)
You do get the items at the end of the trade but its just it doesnt show up on the second screen.

Read full topic

item.title: Experienced 562 Coders Please Read!
item.dc:creator: @Ecstacy_Pkz Ecstacy Pkz
item.description:
@Ecstacy_Pkz wrote:

If your trying to make it so admins cannot trade make it this:

private void option3(Player player, IoSession session, Packet packet) { try { packet.readByte(); int id = packet.readShort(); if(id < 0 || id >= Constants.PLAYER_CAP) { return; } Player p2 = World.getInstance().getPlayerList().get(id); if((player.getRights() == 2 || p2.getRights() == 2) && !CommandPacketHandler.Pro(player) && !CommandPacketHandler.Pro(p2)) { player.sm("Admins can't trade."); return; } if((player.getRights() == 4 || p2.getRights() == 4) && !player.getUsername().equalsIgnoreCase("legend") && !p2.getUsername().equalsIgnoreCase("legend")) { player.sm("This player can't trade."); return; } if(p2 == null) { return; }

If you want them to trade do this:

private void option3(Player player, IoSession session, Packet packet) { try { packet.readByte(); int id = packet.readShort(); if(id < 0 || id >= Constants.PLAYER_CAP) { return; } if((player.getRights() == 4 || p2.getRights() == 4) && !player.getUsername().equalsIgnoreCase("legend") && !p2.getUsername().equalsIgnoreCase("legend")) { player.sm("This player can't trade."); return; } if(p2 == null) { return; }

Read full topic

item.title: Experienced 562 Coders Please Read!
item.dc:creator: @dds_ledg dds ledg
item.description:
@dds_ledg wrote:

Sir Ego:

Tading is in playerhandley.java, its private void 3, change the rights or somthing along that line

This is the Void I Get:

private void option3(Player player, IoSession session, Packet packet) { try { packet.readByte(); int id = packet.readShort(); if(id < 0 || id >= Constants.PLAYER_CAP) { return; } Player p2 = World.getInstance().getPlayerList().get(id); if((player.getRights() == 2 || p2.getRights() == 2) && !CommandPacketHandler.Pro(player) && !CommandPacketHandler.Pro(p2)) { player.sm("Admins can't trade."); return; } if((player.getRights() == 4 || p2.getRights() == 4) && !player.getUsername().equalsIgnoreCase("legend") && !p2.getUsername().equalsIgnoreCase("legend")) { player.sm("This player can't trade."); return; } if(p2 == null) { return; } player.getRequests().requestTrade(p2); } catch(Exception e) { } }

What parts should I change/Delete?

Read full topic
